name: GKRandomSource
desc: The superclass for all basic randomization classes in GameplayKit.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Initializes a new random source object.

items.name: func arrayByShufflingObjects(in: [Any]) -> [Any]
items.desc: Returns an array whose contents are the same as those of the specified array, but in a random order determined by the random source.

items.name: class func sharedRandom() -> GKRandomSource
items.desc: Returns a shared instance that shares a system-wide random source.
